# Distribución de superficie

[Link carpeta](https://github.com/juanchiem/soybean/tree/master/plots_superficie) 

```{r, out.width = "400px"}
plots_superficies <- paste0(here::here(), "/plots_superficies/", "*.png")
Sys.glob(plots_superficies)
Sys.glob(plots_superficies) %>% include_graphics(.)
```
